you trying to do:

  And also the message say "there is no class is found" this message is showed on the bottom of Junit GUI. 
   
  what have you tried:

  and what happens?

Checked that the configured 'TestCollector' is supported on this platform". How do deal with TestCollector in thsi case? I really need your help.
